Translations.Text: avariginta hinde navu adesto janangagalannu nasa madiruvevu. Avaru gogaredaru. Adare, avara bidugadege kalavadhi ulidiralilla
avara paikiye obbanu eccarisuvavanagi avara balige banda kuritu avaru accaripattaru mattu dhikkarigalu helidaru; ‘‘avanu sullu heluttiruva obba matagaranagiddane’’
‘‘avanu ella devarugalannu obba devaragisi bittiddane. Idu khandita vicitravagide’’
avara kelavu nayakaru horatu hogutta helidaru; ‘‘horadiri mattu nim'ma devarugalige nistharagiri. Adara (satya sandesada) hinde khandita eno svarthavide’’
‘‘navu gatakalada dharmadalli antahadenannu kelilla. Adu khandita (avana) svanta racaneyagide’’
‘‘upadesavannu nam'ma naduve ivanige ilisikodalagideye?’’ Nijavagi avaru nanna upadesada kuritu sansayadalliddare. Avarinnu sikseya ruciyannu kandilla
prabalanu udariyu agiruva nim'ma odeyana anugrahada bhandaragalenu avara bali iveye
Akasagala hagu bhumiya mattu avugala naduve iruva ellavugala sarvadhikaravenu avarige serideye? Hagadare avaru enigalanneri hattinodali
avariginta hindinavaru tiraskarisiddaru. Nuhara janangadavaru, ad (janangadavaru) hagu moleyavanada phir‌aun‌na janaru
hageye samudaru hagu lut‌ra janangadavaru mattu aikahdavaru. Avarella (satyavirodhi) padegalagiddaru. Avarellaru dutarugalannu tiraskarisidaru. Konege, avara mele nanna sikseyu banderagitu
avaru kayuttiruva ghataneyu, kevala ondu arbhatavagiruvudu. Abalika yava riyaytiyu sigadu
avaru (vyangyavagi) helidaru; nam'modeya, namage nam'ma palannu vicaraneya dinakkinta modale turtagi kottubidu
(dutare,) avaru aduva matugala kuritu nivu sahanasilaragiri mattu nam'ma saktisali dasaragidda davudarannu smarisiri. Avaru khandita pade pade (allahanedege) maraluvavaragiddaru
navu avara jotege parvatagalannu vidheyagolisiddevu. Avu sanje hagu munjane (allahana) pavitravannu japisuttiddavu
